data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Durango, Mexico.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Durango, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Durango, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary: On average, 84 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Durango, Mexico.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, move the 153,014 believers in the state of Durango to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Durango to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Durango words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 153,014 believers in Durango, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 153,014 believers in Durango that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Durango
location.cities_list: Victoria de Durango, Gómez Palacio, Ciudad Lerdo, Santiago Papasquiaro, El Salto
location.cities_list_w_pop: Victoria de Durango (518,709), Gómez Palacio (257,352), Ciudad Lerdo (79,669), Santiago Papasquiaro (26,121), El Salto (24,241)
